name: THE UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA STUDENT GOVERNMENT ASSOCIATION

sampleDescriptions: Issues regarding Higher Education generally, including student loans, grants, open source text books and Higher Education Act Re-Authorization, and student mental health on campus
